value.name: Victim identified, 16-year-old arrested in fatal West Jordan shooting
value.description: WEST JORDAN, Utah — A 16-year-old was arrested Monday in connection to a shooting in West Jordan that left another teen dead Sunday night. The 19-year-old victim, identified as Caesar Manenche ...

value.name: Bill increasing Utah police access to drug database advances after heated debate
